mapper.select: SELECT p.*, m.USER_ID, m.EMAIL FROM POST p LEFT JOIN MEMBER m on p.user_id = m.user_id WHERE POST_ID = #{postId} AND BOARD_ID = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE POST SET VIEW_CNT = COALESCE(VIEW_CNT, 0) + 1 WHERE POST_ID = #{postId} and BOARD_ID = 1
UPDATE POST SET TITLE = #{title}, POST_CONTENT = #{postContent}, MDF_DT = SYSDATE WHERE POST_ID = #{postId} and BOARD_ID = 1
UPDATE POST SET DEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE POST_ID = #{postId} and BOARD_ID = 1
mapper.select: SELECT LEVEL AS reply_class r.reply_id, r.reply_content, r.reg_dt, r.mdf_dt, r.reply_group, r.reply_order, r.user_id, r.post_id, FROM reply r WHERE r.post_id = #{value} START WITH r.parent_reply_id IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR r.reply_id = r.parent_reply_id ORDER SIBLINGS BY r.reply_order
SELECT NVL(MAX(reply_order), #{replyOrder}) FROM reply WHERE reply_group = #{replyGroup} AND reply_order > #{replyOrder}
